Uses of Package
com.networks.p2pchat

  • Classes in com.networks.p2pchat used by com.networks.p2pchat 
    Class and Description
    AddressBook
    The addressbook contains all known people on the network, holding the ip address and id of each person.
    Channel.JoinResponse
    An enum to be used as a response to a join request.
    Conversation
    Embodies a conversation Holds sender and receiver objects Senders are not threaded, receivers are Takes a ConversationHolder object in the constructor (this also holds the conversation object) Takes a Socket object, from which input and output streams are created.
    ConversationHolder
    Conversation holding class, handles logic of which conversation a particular message should be sent to.
    GraphicInterface
    The graphic interface class is used for displaying all messages to the user and take any input from the user to sent to others.
    Message
    "Already implemented has an efficiency all it's own" - Jacques Visser 2015
    Message.FileType 
    Message.MessageType 
    Peer
    Peer class that represents a user on the network.
    PostOffice
    Primary Post office class, will determine where messages must be sent as well as any logic behind particular message types.
